name: @jest-metadata/benchmark
description: Benchmarks to avoid performance regressions in jest-metadata

scripts.bench:dev: npm run build --workspace=jest-metadata && npm run bench
scripts.bench: npm run bench:1 && npm run bench:10 && npm run bench:100 && npm run bench:1000 && npm run bench:10000
scripts.bench:all: npm run bench:baseline-1 ; npm run bench:baseline-N ; npm run bench:fallback-1 ; npm run bench:fallback-N ; npm run bench:metadata-1 ; npm run bench:metadata-N ; true
